forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy this morning. A few showers developing during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. N winds at 15 to 25 km/h, decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. N winds at 10 to 15 mph, decreasing to less than 5 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 19C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 66F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High near 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High around 55F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady light rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain tapering to a few showers late. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies with gusty winds developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. Becoming windy during the afternoon. High 53F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 6C. NW winds at 25 to 40 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 42F. NW winds at 15 to 25 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 7C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low around 45F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 58F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low near 45F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 54F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 7C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low around 45F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
